name: Dolly Town Council: Centre for Approvals
name_original: Dolly Town Council: Centre for Approvals
description:
Dear Councillor,

PLEASE TAKE NOTE OF THE FOLLOWING.

FOR DOCUMENTS, PLEASE CLICK AND HOLD AND RELEASE.

FOR STAMPING, PLEASE CLICK, THEN CLICK AGAIN TO RELEASE.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR COOPERATION.

- Dolly Town Council: Approval Department

----------

Magical Programmy bits / Sick Tracks - Ben Taylor

Art n' Stuff - T-Dog eXtreme @tdogextreme

----------

Known bugs:

  • Clicking too low with the stamp renders it unusable
  • Misc. graphical errors
